title: Bubbles Pack
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Bubbles sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.


Features:


  • Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to memory capacity.
  • Optimized for games.
  • Pivot point set properly.
  • No setup or plug-ins required.
  • All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

       https://youtu.be/PO_DrHCF0j0      

Technical details:


  • File Formats: transparent Png.
  • Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.
  • 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:

  • Bubble 01 Color_#[512,288].png 3072x2016
  • Bubble 02 Color_#[512,288].png 3072 × 1728
  • Bubble 03 Color_#[512,288].png 3072 × 2016
  • Bubble 04 Color_#[512,288].png 3584 × 2304
  • Bubble 05 Color_#[512,288].png 2048 × 1440
  • Bubble 06 Color_#[512,288].png 3072 × 2304
  • Bubble 07 Color_#[512,288].png 3072 × 2304
  • Bubble 08 Color_#[512,288].png 4096 × 2592
  • Bubble 09 Color_#[512,288].png 4096 × 2592
  • Bubble 10 Color_#[512,288].png 2048 × 1440
  • Bubble 11 Color_#[512,288].png 3072 × 2016
  • Bubble 12 Color_#[512,288].png 2560 × 2016


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
